Coshocton.title: Coshocton
Coshocton.byline: Coshocton is a city in Ohio.

Costa Brava.title: Costa Brava
Costa Brava.byline: The Costa Brava (Rugged Coast) is a coastal region in Catalonia, in the northeast of Spain.

Costa del Sol.title: Costa del Sol
Costa del Sol.byline: The Costa del Sol (literally "sun coast") is a long stretch of Mediterranean coastline in the Andalucia region of southern Spain.

Costa Maya.title: Costa Maya
Costa Maya.byline: The Costa Maya  is in the Quintana Roo state of Mexico.

Costa Mesa.title: Costa Mesa
Costa Mesa.byline: Costa Mesa is a city in Orange County, a region of Southern California.

Costa Rica.title: Costa Rica
Costa Rica.byline: Costa Rica is has bewilderingly diverse culture, climates, flora, and fauna, and landscapes range from rainforests, to dry tropical and temperate forests, to volcanoes, to Caribbean and Pacific beaches, to high mountains, and marshy lowlands.

Costa Smeralda.title: Costa Smeralda
Costa Smeralda.byline: Costa Smeralda is a famous resort area in north-eastern Sardinia.

Costa Verde.title: Costa Verde
Costa Verde.byline: Costa Verde is a region of the state of Rio de Janeiro.

Costa Adeje.title: Costa Adeje
Costa Adeje.byline: Costa Adeje is a resort town north of Los Cristianos.

Costalegre.title: Costalegre
Costalegre.byline: Costalegre is the Pacific coast of the state of Jalisco, Mexico.

Cosalá.title: Cosalá
Cosalá.byline: Cosalá is a small town in the northern state of Sinaloa, Mexico.
